title: Here's how thick the iPhone 17 Air's camera bump is rumored to be
description: Many past rumors have already converged on the fact that Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 Air will be 5.5mm thick. But it will also have a camera bump / visor thing according to most renders, and this will obviously protrude out of its back. If you've been wondering by how much, today we have a rumored number: 4mm. So with the camera bump, the iPhone 17 Air will be 9.5mm thick, and without the hump, it will be 5.5mm. The iPhone 17 Air has been rumored to sport just one rear camera. It will allegedly have a 6.9" LTPO OLED screen just like the iPhone 17 Pro Max. It's also been said to sport...
excerpt: We already knew the thickness without the camera island, now we have the full picture. Many past rumors have already converged on the fact that Apple's...
text: Many past rumors have already converged on the fact that Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 Air will be 5.5mm thick. But it will also have a camera bump / visor thing according to most renders, and this will obviously protrude out of its back. If you've been wondering by how much, today we have a rumored number: 4mm. So with the camera bump, the iPhone 17 Air will be 9.5mm thick, and without the hump, it will be 5.5mm. The iPhone 17 Air has been rumored to sport just one rear camera. It will allegedly have a 6.9" LTPO OLED screen just like the iPhone 17 Pro Max. It's also been said to sport a battery between 3,000 mAh and 4,000 mAh, and that along with the single rear camera will probably be the main compromises made to achieve this thinness. Source (in Chinese)
html:
Many past rumors have already converged on the fact that Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 Air will be 5.5mm thick. But it will also have a camera bump / visor thing according to most renders, and this will obviously protrude out of its back.

If you've been wondering by how much, today we have a rumored number: 4mm. So with the camera bump, the iPhone 17 Air will be 9.5mm thick, and without the hump, it will be 5.5mm.

The iPhone 17 Air has been rumored to sport just one rear camera. It will allegedly have a 6.9" LTPO OLED screen just like the iPhone 17 Pro Max. It's also been said to sport a battery between 3,000 mAh and 4,000 mAh, and that along with the single rear camera will probably be the main compromises made to achieve this thinness.

Source (in Chinese)
